prowl.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: if an animal prowls, it moves around an area quietly, especially because it is hunting another animal
prowl.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: if someone prowls, they move around an area slowly and quietly, especially because they are involved in a criminal activity or because they are looking for something
prowl.translation[0].definitions[1].exam: gangs of teenagers prowling the streets
Irene prowled restlessly around the room.
